meanings.definition: Situated or occurring between offices within the same organization.
meanings.sent1: The interoffice memo was sent to all departments.
meanings.sent2: Our interoffice meetings help us coordinate better.
meanings.sent3: The interoffice rivalry for the best office space was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her interoffice connections helped her climb the corporate ladder.
meanings.sent5: The interoffice communication system was upgraded for efficiency.

meanings.definition: Relating to communication or activities between different offices within the same organization.
meanings.sent1: The interoffice phone system made it easy to reach colleagues.
meanings.sent2: Interoffice emails keep everyone informed about company updates.
meanings.sent3: The interoffice basketball tournament brought teams together.
meanings.sent4: Their interoffice collaboration led to a successful project.
meanings.sent5: Interoffice relationships can strengthen teamwork within the company.
